issue.title: Harness after advancing checkpoint can fail to exit state 4

content.raw: I know there's no way to fix this now, but this bug is costing us points. This should have been a blocker. If you are stable enough to never fall then you are ok, but if you need to reharness, 30-40 percent of the time you will be stuck, and that means stuck forever. If you detach you will collapse immediately. If you reset checkpoint, you will be stuck in 4 again. We had to request a constellation reset twice (which takes precious time) in the same world and when we were stuck the 3rd time we decided to just let it go and move on to the next world because we are running out of time. This is an issue that's seriously interfering with our progress.
